Articles.Content:
When I was launching my SLS replica, the decouplers kept spawning the white smoke, and when I decoupled the whole thing disappeared. IVA still worked though. Ksp version 0.90

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-22T21:14:20Z" title="05/22/2015 09:14  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 22, 2015</time> by AeronautEdward**
  
ICPS adapter still glitched

The constant decoupler FX sounds like you have TweakableEverything TweakScale installed.

Try removing that and see if it helps.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-21T22:10:09Z" title="05/21/2015 10:10  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 21, 2015</time> by sumghai**
  
Whoops, referred to the wrong add-on!
It worked! Btw, I also have a bug with your station modules being invisible execpt the hatches, that a bug or your still working on them?
I take that back. It's still broken
I have problems with it to.. When I use it, the game ALWAYS crashes..
